events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer role, highlighting experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The recruitment team categorized the incoming application under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate's resume and role applied for.
A recruiter was assigned to manage this engineering candidate's recruitment process and scheduled the next steps accordingly.
The recruiter conducted an initial phone screening to assess the candidate's technical skills and cultural fit for the software developer position.
The candidate promptly responded expressing enthusiasm for the opportunity and availability for a technical interview in the upcoming week.
The technical interview was scheduled with the engineering team lead, confirming the date and time for an in-depth coding and system design discussion.
